name: Saurabh
reviews: Recently purchase future generali travel insurance. The plan is good but the claims are not that good. The dental mediclaims are included and the luggage only. No returns for tickets. The policy coverage is 77% and the service is nice with fast interface. Please improve your claiming.
fulreview: Recently purchase future generali travel insurance. The plan is good but the claims are not that good. The dental mediclaims are included and the luggage only. No returns for tickets. The policy coverage is 77% and the service is nice with fast interface. Please improve your claiming.

name: Mayank
reviews: My future generali travel insurance is the best. It provided the policy at very low price. The policy coverage is high and the premiums is low. Service is fast, all work is done on online and the no paperwork which remove the tension of the queue system. Claims are also good which includes the medical and luggage.

name: Gagneet
reviews: I took future generali travel insurance plan. The policy coverage and claims are high but in reverse the policy premiums are very low. The dental medication is free of any charges that  it included in the policy. The lost luggage and belongings is also recovered. Good travel insurance in low investment.

name: Vikas
reviews: The policy i have is future generali travel insurance. I'm not satisfied with the policy. The policy premiums are high and the returns are not good as respect to investment. Around 70% coverage is avail for the lost luggage. The dental medical facilitate for free rest may take charges according to the terms and conditions. Service is bit slow but web services are okay.
fulreview: My future generali travel insurance is the best. It provided the policy at very low price. The policy coverage is high and the premiums is low. Service is fast, all work is done on online and the no paperwork which remove the tension of the queue system. Claims are also good which includes the medical and luggage.

name: devraj
reviews: The policy i have is future generali travel insurance. The policy coverage is high and the claims are high too. Service provided by the executives and the staff members are really very nice and on time. Good coverage which covers the mediclaims and luggage lost recovery. Nice investment which secure my travelling.

name: shiba
reviews: I purchase future generali travel insurance. The policy plan is good with nice benefits. The policy covers medical cases and baggage insurance included in the policy plan. Good future security of travelling and luggage including medical backups. I like the policy plan.
